enhanced_by.reason: The validate method ensures that the predicates are not null, which is a prerequisite for the test method to function correctly.
The copy method creates a copy of the predicates, which is often necessary to ensure immutability and proper function of the test method.
The truePredicate method provides a predicate that always returns true, which can be used to set up edge cases in the test method.
The coerce method ensures that the predicate is of the correct type, which is necessary for the test method to execute properly.
